Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Orleans/Wacker
ShortDescription: NB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Wacker, LaSalle, Hubbard, and Orleans, due to, street blockage near Orleans/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Wacker, LaSalle, Hubbard, and Orleans, due to, street blockage near Orleans/Wacker.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
